Empath wheels in the sky and dives, her weapons blazing.  She cares 
about only one target: Hydras himself.

Meanwhile, Pumpskin sees the barrage from Katya and dashes to 
intercept her, drawing his twin leaf-blade scimitars as he goes.  As 
he closes in from the side, the four lashing tentacles on his back 
suddenly extend to a length of 20 feet and surround his much smaller 
adversary, attempting to trap her in their crushing grip.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Nic" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> Under the heavy foliage, Katya watches the scene. She definitely 
sees 
> that Hydras is the main attacker. Wolfenstein is a threat too.
> 
> Katya: What is the range of your weapons, Blackfang?
> 
> Blackfang: My shotgun can fire up to mid-range, and my pulse laser 
> only to short range.
> 
> Katya thinks a moment.
> 
> Katya: Okay. I will make a hit-and-run while you remain covered and 
> try to take that wolfboy out. After that, go back in the trees.
> 
> Blackfang nods. She starts running, still far from the Predacons 
and 
> opens fire with her heavy large and medium lasers. She aims mainly 
> Hydras. Blackfang starts pumping four energy shots at Wolfenstein.
> He then fall back in the trees.
> 
> Katya: Star Colonel, the kills are yours. Skill, Ragnar!
> 
> Ragnar: Skill, Katya! Kup, Aerotaur, Windlord, Empath, concentrate 
> your fire on my targets, the main Pred force. Forget about honor, 
take 
> all the targets you want.
> 
> He locks his missiles on Wolfenstein and lets them loose on him 
along 
> with a large laser, while he shoots the other large laser at Hydras 
as 
> well as a supersonic gauss slug.
> 
> Ragnar: Maximals, today, we rid this planet of the scum that stains 
> it!
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > "I'd say we have to distract those goons before they knock the 
> > shields out."  Wheeljack indicates Hydras's group.  "The defense 
> grid 
> > has all it can handle just fending off the Preds' friends over 
> > there."  He points out Devilcat and Gatara, blazing away with 
> > repeated bursts from their weapons of choice.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "CatMaster o" <catmastero@y...> wrote:
> > > Inferno was blasting whildly away with energy blasts against the
> > > maximal shilds while Waspinator fired explosive stingers from 
his 
> > hand
> > > held weapon.
> > > 
> > > Kenzo ran to join up with with Kup and Wheeljack-X "You guys 
have 
> > any
> > > ideas?"
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > > > Pumpskin chortles as he blazes away indiscriminately with his 
> eye 
> > > > lasers.
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., aerosmith60@c... wrote:
> > > > >  Hydras landed and his body seemed to bolt out fire from 
every 
> > > > vein.  He shot 
> > > > > every weapon in his arsenal at the shields.  Proot 
transformed 
> > into 
> > > > Rodimus 
> > > > > Prime and fired several shots. Destructor followed 
suit. "We 
> > must 
> > > > bring these 
> > > > > sheilds down!" (hopefully they wont last forever)
